definition: The act of an official state agency refusing entry to a specific individual, group or object
The act of finishing a specified legal or bureaucratic process
The act of a sovereign putting in place a law or measure alone
The act of a governmental institutional canceling or otherwise dismantling a specific edict, law, or planned process
The act of introducing a piece of legislation in a parliamentary chamber
The act of submission of a formal legal request for processing
The act of an executive agency issuing enforceable rules pursuant to its authority
The act of providing testimony to governmental entities such as parliamentary committees, whether in written or spoken form (not testimony in a trial)
The act of a parliament or governmental entity rejecting a proposed piece of legislation or other parliamentary act
The act of a parliament or governmental entity approving a proposed piece of legislation
The act of an executive or non-legislative governmental entity approving a formal act or document
The act of legal withdrawal from a process or status
The act of accepting legal claims made against oneself
The act of legal arrest with specified charges performed by agents of the state
The act of legal arrest without prior to or without charges having been brought
The act of legal transfer of an arrested person to another jurisdiction
The act of levying a monetary charge for legal infraction on an individual or institution
The act of an agent or institution of the state bringing charges of any scope against variety against an identified target, including cause for arrest
The act of formal incarceration of an individual with respect to specified charges
The act of the killing of an individual or individuals by the domestic security forces of the state
Any act related to the examination of allegedly illegal actions, carried out by agents of the state, at any scale of jurisdiction
The act of a specified agency of the court system of a state commencing work on a specified case or other designated process
The act of the resubmitting of an identified court case to a higher court for consideration after a ruling by a lower court
The act of freeing someone from incarceration
The legal rejection of a request or demand filed formally
The act of questioning of an individual or institutions by an agent of state security or legal agencies under official capacity
The act of a state agency rendering a decision on a case that was before it
The act of disruption of a public gathering by the domestic security apparatus of the state
The act of a court or other domestic security agency of a state handing down a sentence to be carried out against an arrested individual
The seizure of physical materials by the domestic security forces of a state in connection with formalized legal processes
The act of allowing an individual or entity to pursue a specific identified course of action
The act of filing a lawsuit
The act of making an executive order
The act of formal accession to a specified negotiating position, argument or request
The act of meeting between any two or more agents of two different institutions for any formal purposes; assumes speaking takes place as well
The act of coming into formal possession of an identified missive or communication
The act of granting formal status under law to a specific person, institution or act
The act of a state agency establishing designated legal punishment against a state, institution or individual, to be enforced by the state
The act of speaking between any two or more agents of institutions for diplomatic, commercial or political purposes, while not meeting
The act of selecting an individual for a designated office or post without the need for confirmation of this choice by another agency
The act of starting a term of office or other designated term
The act of giving formal verbal or written support for a specified candidate for specified office
The act of legally creating an entity of the state or a political party or similar legal personhood of a political entity
The act of selecting an individual for a designated office or post with the need for confirmation of this choice by another agency
The act of verbally retracting an endorsement already given
The act of holding a public protest, rally or gathering for any political purpose
The act of winning an election
The act of purchase of a specified entity or object by a designated purchaser
The act of permanently ceasing operations and shutting down a commercial operation
The act of providing economic capital to a designated enterprise, project or state entity in exchange for debt instruments
The act of combining the legal personhoods of more than one commercial entity into a single legal entity
The act of commencing operations in a new commercial operation
The act of providing economic capital to a designated enterprise or project in exchange for equity as part of the initial investment in that enterprise
The act of sale of a specified entity or object by a specified seller, who possessed the sold object prior to sale
The act of providing economic capital to a designated enterprise or project in exchange for equity at any time after initial investment
The act of the dispatch of a specified number of soldiers or quantity of military matierel to a specified location by an act of the state
The act of the public use, deployment or training of military equipment for non-kinetic purposes
The act of forcibly capturing individuals for coercive or criminal purposes
The act of a military force, state or nonstate, engaging in a kinetic attack against an identified target
The act of violence by a military force against a specified target without death resulting
The act of strategic seizure of specified territory or location by an organized military force, whether state or nonstate
The act of strategic withdrawal from a specified territory or location by an organized military force, whether state or nonstate
The act of a military force, state or nonstate, moving towards or against a specified place of settlement or other location
The act of killing or destroying a specified target by an organized military force, whether state or nonstate
The act of an agency of the state withdrawing permission for any public gathering or protest for any political purpose
The act of causing physical damage or destruction to a physical, non-living thing through negligence or error
The act of dying for reasons of disease, age, suicide or accident
The act of destroying a physical, non-living thing by whatever means, whether by state or non-state actors
The act of dismissing a specific individual from a specific post at a specific institution
To present a physical object or asset of any size to any individual or institution
The act of traveling to a specified location
The act of formally offering a specific post at an institution to a specific individual
The act of physical attack, whether by a civilian or agent of the state, without death resulting
The act of killing by a civilian
The act of putting in place any kind of sanction or punishment other than that established and enforced by the sovereign, which is sanction
The act of a specific individual leaving a specific post voluntarily
The act of adding additional layers of security, whether physical or digital, to a designated location or site
The act of temporarily withdrawing participatory rights in an organization's activities
To level a specific complaint of alleged intent or subterfuge at an identified actor or institution
To raise a defined, unverified but falsifiable allegation of fact, connection, intent at an identified actor or institution
To raise in public the official position of that institution in a capacity as an agent of an institution
To offer support and endorsement in rhetoric for a specific individual, institution, practice or other database entity
To raise a negative opinion, critique or otherwise unfavorable view of a specific topic
To offer an unstructured, unfalsifiable,undirected,public opinion on any individual, institution, condition or other object, negative or positive
To offer a public rejection of a previously-offered negotiating position from an identified individual or institution
To offer a public expression of regret, apology, or repentance for a specific action or situation
To offer a defined warning to a specified individual, instuitution or state regarding a specified course of action and promised response
To offer encouragement or external rhetorical impetus directed at a specified individual or instiutution regarding a specified  action
To raise public concern regarding possible harm or damage in a defined or undefined way from a specified action, individual or action
To assert the factual truth of a statement, speculation, allegation or question
To reject publicly a specific allegation, accusation or speculation
To explicate publicly a set of facts regarding a broadly-obtaining condition, set of actions or external situation
To provide a professional guess or evaluation as to the knowable facts surrounding, or cause of, a specific event, condition, idea, person or thing
To offer the formal government position on a given topic, in one's capacity representing that government
As an individual, to assert an interpretation of a specific set of events, actions or situation
To articulate and insist on a specific point of negotiation or difference of argumentation between the speaker and a specific defined counterparty
As an agent of an institution, to offer publicly a specific negotiating position, suggested action or sought result to be achieved by defined means
To relay an institutional confirmation or explication of a defined set of verifiable external conditions or events
To announce the results of an election or referendum
To raise publicly a hypothetical possibility regarding motive or intent of past actions or likelihood of future action
To offer a formal declaration of institutional or individual position on a defined individual, institution, condition or event,
For a media outlet to raise a defined, unverified but falsifiable allegation of fact, connection, intent at an identified actor or institution
For a media outlet to offer an unstructured, unfalsifiable opinion or interpretation on any individual, institution, event or other condition
A reported rumor or widely speculated interpretation whose source can not be identified by the individuals reporting it, but which is widely discussed
A specific claim, opinion or interpretation made off-the-record and reported without full attribution at the request of the claimant or in the interest of secrecy
A statement of fact on institutional representation or intent made without full attribution at the request of the claimant
A factual claim or assessment made by an individual or organization whose underlying factual truth cannot be verified at the time of claim for reasons of security or information access
Announcement that an identified individual or group of individuals will be attending a specified event at a specified time and place
Announcement of a date on which a specified event or action has been scheduled to take place
Announcement of the intent of an individual, group of individuals or institution to undertake a specific action
Announcement that an identified individual will meet with another identified individual or group of individuals
Announcement that a specified institution will adopt a specified policy on a specified issue
Announcement that an identified individual or group of individuals will visit a specified location
Release of data and, if applicable, related calculations and analytic conclusions on them by a statistical agency, commercial entity or research institution
Release of an interview with an identified individual
Release of data specifically on an ongoing election in an identified state
Release of research, conclusions and, if applicable, recommendations on them by a statistical or governmental agency, commercial entity or research institution
